snippet: The bus was carrying athletes and officials from Morocco’s Ministry of Youth and Sports for a national sports competition when it and a tanker truck collided.
abstract: Thirty-three people are killed and seven injured in southern Morocco when bus filled with young athletes collides with tanker truck.
lead_paragraph: The bus was carrying athletes and officials from Morocco’s Ministry of Youth and Sports for a national sports competition when it and a tanker truck collided.

headline.main: Truck and Bus With Athletes Crash in Morocco, and 33 Die
headline.print_headline: Truck and Bus With Athletes Crash in Morocco, and 33 Die
